addASpaceMember.description: Add a user to a Google Chat space.

props.name: email
props.description: The email address of the member to find

getDirectMessageDetails.description: Retrieve details of a specific direct message by ID.

getMessageDetails.description: Retrieve details of a specific message by ID. Supports both system-generated and custom message IDs.

props.name: name
props.description: The full resource name of the message. Format: spaces/{space}/messages/{message}

searchMessages.description: Search within Chat for messages matching keywords or filters.

props.name: keyword
props.description: Search for messages containing this text

props.name: limit
props.description: Maximum number of messages to return

sendAMessage.description: Send a message to a space or direct conversation.

props.name: text
props.description: The message content to send. Supports basic formatting like *bold*, _italic_, and @mentions.

props.name: messageReplyOption
props.description: How to handle replies when thread ID is provided.

props.name: customMessageId
props.description: Optional unique ID for this message (auto-generated if empty). Useful for deduplication.

props.name: isPrivate
props.description: Send this message privately to a specific user. Requires app authentication.

props.name: privateMessageViewer
props.description: Select the user who can view this private message.

newMention.description: Triggers when a new mention is received in Google Chat.

newMessage.description: Triggers when a new message is received in Google Chat.
